snippet: Catcher Russell Martin, who helped the Pirates to consecutive wild-card berths, built on that success by agreeing with the Blue Jays on a five-year, $82 million contract.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes Russell Martin, former New York Yankees catcher, agrees with the Toronto Blue Jays on a five-year, $82 million contract, pending a physical exam; if Martin helps Blue Jays to the playoffs, he could be hailed as a hero in Canada, his native country.
lead_paragraph: Catcher Russell Martin, who helped the Pirates to consecutive wild-card berths, built on that success by agreeing with the Blue Jays on a five-year, $82 million contract.

headline.seo: Russell Martin Heads to the Toronto Blue Jays
headline.main: Blue Jays Stake Future on Former Yankee
headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Stake Future on Former Yankee
